name: HTML & CSS

project.description: a simple parallax website can be styled using the margin, padding, and text/font CSS properties.

project.description: a simple landing page can be styled using the margin, padding, display and text/font CSS properties.

project.name: restaurant page
project.description: A responsive restaurant website built with HTML and CSS, showcasing the menu, ambiance, and services with a clean design and smooth navigation.

project.description: A responsive hotel website built with HTML and CSS, showcasing rooms, amenities, and services with a clean design and easy navigation.

project.name: sidebarmenue
project.description: A sidebar menu is a vertical navigation panel typically placed on the left or right side of a webpage, offering quick access to different sections.

project.name: animation effects
project.description: A collection of fun and creative animation effects designed for students to practice animation. These effects to help build hands-on skills in web development.

project.name: login page with animation
project.description: A login page with a moving border! You can create this effect using CSS for the animated border, and a bit of keyframe animations to make the border move smoothly.

project.name: digital clock with animation
project.description: A digital clock with animation is a fun project! You can build it using HTML for structure, CSS for styling and animations.

project.name: rotating cube animation
project.description: A visually striking 3D rotating cube created with HTML, CSS, and animations. The cube smoothly spins along its axis, showcasing dynamic transitions and a sleek, modern design.

project.name: chess board clone
project.description: A simple and responsive chess board clone built using CSS Grid to create a clean and organized board structure.

project.name: ludo board Clone
project.description: A colorful Ludo board clone built using HTML and CSS Grid, accurately replicating the classic game layout. The grid system creating a clean and responsive design.

project.name: hotstar clone
project.description: A responsive Hotstar clone built using HTML, CSS. It features a dynamic grid layout, smooth navigation, delivering a clean and modern design.
